009package Binary_Regions;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.gui.Overlay;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.pub.regions.Contour;
019import imagingbook.pub.regions.ContourOverlay;
020import imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionContourLabeling;
021import imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion;
022
023import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
024import java.util.List;
025
026/**
027 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the class {@link RegionContourLabeling}
028 * to perform both region labeling and contour tracing simultaneously.
029 * The resulting contours are displayed as a non-destructive vector overlay.
030 * 
031 * @author WB
032 * @version 2020/04/01
033 */
034public class Region_Contours_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
035        
036        static boolean ListRegions = true;
037        static boolean ListContourPoints = false;
038        static boolean ShowContours = true;
039        
040        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
041                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
042        }
043        
044        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
045                if (!getUserInput())
046                return;
047                
048                // Make sure we have a proper byte image:
049                ByteProcessor I = ip.convertToByteProcessor();
050                
051                // Create the region labeler / contour tracer:
052                RegionContourLabeling seg = new RegionContourLabeling(I);
053                
054                // Get the list of detected regions (sort by size):
055                List<BinaryRegion> regions = seg.getRegions(true);
056                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
057                        IJ.error("No regions detected!");
058                        return;
059                }
060
061                if (ListRegions) {
062                        IJ.log("Detected regions: " + regions.size());
063                        for (BinaryRegion r: regions) {
064                                IJ.log(r.toString());
065                        }
066                }
067                        
068                if (ListContourPoints) {
069                        // Get the outer contour of the largest region:
070                        BinaryRegion largestRegion = regions.get(0);
071                        Contour oc =  largestRegion.getOuterContour();
072                        IJ.log("Points along outer contour of largest region:");
073                        Point[] points = oc.getPointArray();
074                        for (int i = 0; i < points.length; i++) {
075                                Point p = points[i];
076                                IJ.log("Point " + i + ": " + p.toString());
077                        }
078                        
079                        // Get all inner contours of the largest region:
080                        List<Contour> ics = largestRegion.getInnerContours();
081                        IJ.log("Inner regions (holes): " + ics.size());
082                }
083                
084                
085                // Display the contours if desired:
086                if (ShowContours) {
087                        ImageProcessor lip = seg.makeLabelImage(false);
088                        ImagePlus lim = new ImagePlus("Region labels and contours", lip);
089                        Overlay oly = new ContourOverlay(seg);
090                        lim.setOverlay(oly);
091                        lim.show();
092                }
093        }
094        
095        boolean getUserInput() {
096                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(Region_Contours_Demo.class.getSimpleName());
097                gd.addCheckbox("List regions", ListRegions);
098                gd.addCheckbox("List contour points", ListContourPoints);
099                gd.addCheckbox("Show contours", ShowContours);
100                gd.showDialog();
101                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
102                        return false;
103                }
104                ListRegions = gd.getNextBoolean();
105                ListContourPoints = gd.getNextBoolean();
106                ShowContours = gd.getNextBoolean();
107                return true;
108        }
109}
